0.9:
{@code const LOCATIONS = [{
    info: "Склад",
    firstPos: mappet.vector3(0, 0, 0),
    lastPos: mappet.vector3(1, 1, 1)
}]
const HUD_ID = "HUD_locations"

function main(c) {
    let s = c.subject

    LOCATIONS.forEach(
        function(loc) {
            let firstPos = loc.firstPos
            let lastPos = loc.lastPos
            let box = mappet.box(
                firstPos.x, firstPos.y, firstPos.z,
                lastPos.x, lastPos.y, lastPos.z
            )

            if (box.contains(s.getPosition())) {
                s.setupHUD(HUD_ID)
                s.changeHUDMorph(HUD_ID, 0, mappet.createMorph('{Background:-1828716544,Label:"Локация: [e' + loc.info + '",Name:"label"}'))
            }
        })
}
}
